name: Moon Turkish Cotton Appliqued Bathrobe
description:
Featured in everything from Baby Mama (worn by Amy Poehler) to Buffy The Vampire Slayer (worn by Sarah Michelle Gellar), this robe is a Hollywood hit! Made from 100% Luxurious Turkish Terry Loop Cotton, it features 10 adorable moon appliques, a luscious soft yellow background, two front pockets, a matching belt, 36" (or knee) length, and a super soft feel. One size fits all specs are guaranteed to be cozy on just about anyone! Makes a great gift for that special someone or for yourself!

Check out our Hollywood Press Photos to see it on celebrities!
